item.description:
The Socialist Party will meet at 5:30 pm on Sunday, 13 June 2010 in the Lucy Parsons Center. We'll organize for several major events coming up this summer, including the United National Antiwar Conference, the US Social Forum, the Socialist Party's own National Organizing Conference, as well as our annual Anti-Imperialist Fourth of July radical picnic.

Members, supporters, and the curious are all invited to attend.

The Lucy Parsons Center is located at 549 Columbus Ave. in the South End, near the Mass Ave. T stop on the Orange Line, the Symphony T stop on the Green Line (E), and the #1 bus line.

See you there!


Preliminary agenda

Tentative and subject to change prior to and at the meeting

* Introductions
o Credentials, elect a facilitator and minutes taker, approve an agenda

* Membership and development
o Evaluate new applications
o Reports from local Secretary and Treasurer
o Assign follow-up to new contacts, absent members, expiring members

* Regional Report
o Organizing leads in Worcester, North Shore, South Shore
o New England
+ New England Regional meeting this summer in New Hampshire
+ New England Regional meeting Sept. 18 - 19 in Boston

* National Report
o Statements on Greece and Palestine
o Upcoming National Committee meeting, June 19 & 20
o US Social Forum, June 22 - 27
o National Organizing Conference, August 14 & 15

* Organizing Projects and Campaigns
o 4th of July Anti-Imperialist Picnic
o Boston May Day Committee Report
+ Protest AZ SB 1070 and the Diamondbacks at Fenway, June 15
+ National Governor’s Association protest, July 9 - 11
+ Fall Conference with David Bacon on solutions to immigration
o Stop the Wars Coalition Report
+ Report on Jerry Levy’s performance of Marx in Soho by Howard Zinn
+ John Yoo, author of torture memos, visits Boston, June 15
+ United National Antiwar Conference, Albany, July 23 - 25
o Labor Solidarity Campaigns
+ Industrial Workers of the World
+ Harvard No-Layoffs Campaign
+ Alliance for Fair Foods

* Logistics and Scheduling
o Socializing for Socialism (The Otherside Cafe, Wed, 7/14)
o Next Local Meeting
item.name: Local Business Meeting
